en.injectionModeInvalid: Invalid injection mode, defaulting to pty

emailConfig.title: Email Configuration
emailConfig.quickSetup: Quick setup for common email providers

setupInstructions.gmail: For Gmail: Enable 2FA and create an app password at https://myaccount.google.com/apppasswords
setupInstructions.outlook: For Outlook: Create an app password at https://account.microsoft.com/security
setupInstructions.qq: For QQ Mail: Enable IMAP/SMTP and get authorization code in Settings
setupInstructions.163: For 163 Mail: Enable IMAP/SMTP and get authorization code in Settings

telegramConfig.chatId: Personal chat ID (optional if group ID set)

lineConfig.userId: LINE user ID (optional if group ID set)

en.hooksNotSupported: Codex CLI does not support hooks. Skipping hook setup.
en.hooksAlternative: Tip: start Codex in tmux and run `claude-remote monitor` to auto-notify.
en.nextStep1: 1) Start Codex in tmux and run: claude-remote monitor
en.invalidSettings: Existing settings were invalid, backup created at

zh.welcome: === Codex Code Remote 交互式设置 ===
zh.injectionModeInvalid: 无效的注入模式，默认使用 pty

emailConfig.title: 邮件配置
emailConfig.appPassword: 应用专用密码（不是您的常规密码）
emailConfig.allowedSenders: 允许的发件人（逗号分隔）

setupInstructions.gmail: Gmail 设置：启用两步验证并在 https://myaccount.google.com/apppasswords 创建应用专用密码
setupInstructions.outlook: Outlook 设置：在 https://account.microsoft.com/security 创建应用密码
setupInstructions.qq: QQ邮箱设置：在设置中启用 IMAP/SMTP 并获取授权码
setupInstructions.163: 163邮箱设置：在设置中启用 IMAP/SMTP 并获取授权码

telegramConfig.chatId: 个人聊天 ID（如果设置了群组 ID 可选）
telegramConfig.whitelist: 白名单聊天 ID（逗号分隔，可选）

lineConfig.userId: LINE 用户 ID（如果设置了群组 ID 可选）
lineConfig.whitelist: LINE 白名单 ID（逗号分隔，可选）

zh.hooksNotSupported: Codex CLI 暂不支持 hooks，已跳过 hooks 设置。
zh.hooksAlternative: 提示：在 tmux 中启动 Codex 并运行 `claude-remote monitor` 进行自动通知。
zh.nextStep1: 1) 在 tmux 中启动 Codex 并运行：claude-remote monitor
zh.invalidSettings: 现有设置无效，已创建备份
